OP02-001.name: Edward Newgate OP02-001
OP02-001.effect: [End of Your Turn] Add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP02-004.effect: [On Play] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn. [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less.
